title: Spotify
description: Stream millions of songs, albums, and podcasts. Create playlists, follow friends, and enjoy personalized recommendations on any device.

title: Duolingo
description: Learn languages in a fun and interactive way. Track your progress, complete bite-sized lessons, and practice speaking, reading, and listening daily.

title: Canva
description: Create stunning graphics, social posts, and presentations using thousands of templates and drag-and-drop design tools. Perfect for both beginners and pros.

title: Snapseed
description: Professional photo editor with precise tools and filters. Adjust brightness, contrast, and apply selective edits for high-quality images.

title: Notion
description: All-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, and databases. Organize personal and team projects seamlessly with customizable templates and integrations.

title: Pinterest
description: Discover ideas for recipes, fashion, home design, and more. Save pins, organize boards, and get inspired for your next project.

title: Calm
description: Meditation and sleep app offering guided sessions, breathing exercises, and relaxing music to reduce stress and improve focus.

title: Shazam
description: Identify songs playing around you instantly. Discover new music and add tracks to playlists in Spotify or Apple Music.

title: YouTube
description: Watch, upload, and share videos worldwide. Follow creators, explore trending content, and enjoy playlists and live streams.

title: Facebook
description: Connect with friends, share posts, photos, and videos. Join groups, follow pages, and stay updated with social networking features.

title: Instagram
description: Share photos, videos, and stories. Follow friends, explore trending content, and use Reels and IGTV for creative engagement.

title: TikTok
description: Short-form video platform to create, watch, and share entertaining content globally. Discover trending challenges and viral videos daily.

title: Google Maps
description: Navigate the world with accurate maps, live traffic updates, and local business information. Plan routes for driving, walking, or public transport.

title: Netflix
description: Stream movies, TV shows, and documentaries. Enjoy offline downloads, personalized recommendations, and multi-device support.

title: LinkedIn
description: Professional networking platform to connect, learn, and advance your career. Post updates, follow companies, and apply for jobs.

title: Zoom
description: Video conferencing and online meeting app. Host and join meetings, webinars, and screen sharing sessions for work or personal use.
